message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[07-May-2025 06:57:06 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_dwul_disable_user_email ( id int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, useremail varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
